Name: Escape From Meat City
About the game: Escape from Meat City is an intense, fast-paced first person shooter set in a surreal world where humans are raised for their meat. As an escapee from the slaughterhouse, you'll need to catch the bus and shoot your way through hordes of Federal Agents to make it out of town. Fight with a huge arsenal of randomized weapons, collect powerups, and explore the nightmarish urban sprawl of Meat City. Escape from Meat City is a roguelike shooter featuring randomized levels and permadeath. Each new game is a randomized journey through 9 different stages, populated with a unique set of enemies and items each time. If you die, it's game over, and you'll be sent back to the beginning to try again with a newly generated run. Try again and again to see all the 15+ unique enemies, 40+ unique weapons, and dozens of friendly characters.
